select COUNT(1) from tree_paths t left join app_users u on u.id = t.descendant where t.ancestor = #{id} and t.level > 0 and u.valid=1 and u.level>0

mapper.insert: insert into tree_paths (ancestor, descendant, LEVEL) select t.ancestor,#{uid},LEVEL + 1 from tree_paths AS t where t.descendant = #{pid}
